sitesDesc.message: Add the sites for which you want to enable Wn-Reload. Specify a domain or subdomain without the http:// prefix. For example: example.com, subdomen.example.com

confirmDeleteSite.message: Are you sure you want to remove site from the list of sites?

confirmDeleteModel.message: Are you sure you want to delete the model?

labelLinkToolbar.message: Insert a link to the front page in the backend website bar

confirmDeleteCategory.message: Are you sure you want to delete this category?

settingsSaveError.message: An error occurred while reading the file. The settings were not saved.

exportDesc.message: This option allows you to save the extension settings as a json file on the local computer.

importDesc.message: This option allows you to download a json file containing settings for the Wn-Reload extension.
